txt.en:
'We need your help, [placeholder]. There is a Warg-rider that comes at night, just as the sun sets. We can do naught to stop him, no trap has worked. He is slowly killing us off one-by-one.

'I think Alrekur feathered him with an arrow the last time he came, because we have not seen him for a couple of days, but I have no doubt his fury is growing while his Warg's wounds heal.

'Dulgurz, the Warg-rider, must be stopped. We cannot keep living this way, never knowing when the Warg-rider will attack next. Head south-east, to Athmadhul, he should be recovering there. But be wary, the arrow only nicked him: do not underestimate him.'
'Finally, a night where I can sleep sound, without the fear of hearing those feet come pounding towards me. I thank you.'
'Please. If Dulgurz comes at us again, I am sure it will be our last.'
Dulgurz has terrorized the dwarves of the Dimrill Dale since they first set camp.
Dulgurz is at Athmadhul, south-east of Mekhem-bizru.\n\nÓtam told you of a particulary dangerous Warg-rider, Dulgurz, who must no longer be allowed to roam the Dimrill Dale.
Ótam is at Mekhem-bizru, north-west of Athmadhul.\n\nÓtam will want to hear of the defeat of Dulgurz.
